title: Diamond Floral Necklace - A Timeless Elegance
materials: adorned with brilliant-cut diamonds. The diamonds are meticulously set to maximize brilliance and fire. Total diamond weight: D.pan(+7):-1.08(27) and D.mq(+7):-0.77(18). Gold Weight: 22.600 (Fg) and Dwt: -0.28(23)
features: A contemporary floral design necklace. Each floral motif is delicately encrusted with pave-set diamonds, creating a dazzling effect. The intricate detailing and graceful curvature of the necklace make it a true statement piece. Secure clasp ensures comfortable and confident wear.
colors: with the sparkling brilliance of the diamonds set against the lustrous white gold.
occasions: Perfect for adding a touch of elegance to any occasion
from cocktail parties and formal dinners to weddings and special celebrations. A beautiful choice for the modern bride or a cherished gift for a loved one.
description: This diamond floral necklace embodies modern elegance and timeless beauty. The exquisite craftsmanship and high-quality diamonds ensure a piece that will be treasured for generations. Its versatile design makes it suitable for a wide range of occasions. The exceptional brilliance of the diamonds will capture attention and enhance any ensemble.
